src:
UFC 244 weigh-in results and video: Masvidal 169.6, Diaz 170.4
01 Nov 2019, 19:16 by Mookie Alexander
The official weigh-ins for UFC 244 are complete, and nearly everyone made weight. I say “nearly” because Jennifer Maia for the second time running has come in over the flyweight limit. Her bout vs. Katlyn Chookagian will now be at a 127 lbs catchweight, but this is a hammer blow for Maia’s title shot aspirations.
Watch ‘UFC 244 - ‘MASVIDAL VS DIAZ’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action! Plus, you get access to the best of the UFC Archives & more! GET THE FIGHTS!
As for the headliners, Nate Diaz weighed in at 170.4 lbs to Jorge Masvidal’s 169.6 lbs, making the BMF title official. Despite the delayed trip to the USA due to visa issues, Darren Till arrived in New York and made the non-title middleweight limit of 186 lbs. Kelvin Gastelum? Ehhhh things were a bit shady.
Related LIVE UFC 244 - 'Jorge Masvidal vs. Nate Diaz' Radio-Style Play-By-Play Results Stream
Here are the full UFC 244 weigh-in results below. You can watch the official weigh-in highlights at the top of the page, courtesy of MMA Fighting.

Main Card (

ESPN+

 PPV, 10 p.m. ET)

Nate Diaz (170.4) vs. Jorge Masvidal (169.6)
Kelvin Gastelum (184) vs. Darren Till (186)
Stephen Thompson (170.4) vs. Vicente Luque (170.2)
Derrick Lewis (265) vs. Blagoy Ivanov (257.4)
Kevin Lee (155.6) vs. Gregor Gillespie (155.4)

Preliminaries (ESPN2, 8 p.m. ET)

Corey Anderson (204.6) vs. Johnny Walker (204.8)
Shane Burgos (145.8) vs. Makwan Amirkhani (145.4)
Brad Tavares (184.6) vs. Edmen Shahbazyan (185)
Andrei Arlovski (244) vs. Jairzinho Rozenstruik (246.2)

Preliminary Card (UFC Fight Pass, 6:15 PM ET)

Katlyn Chookagian (125.4) vs. Jennifer Maia* (127.2) - Maia fined 20% of her purse
Lyman Good (169.6) vs. Chance Rencountre (170.8)
Julio Arce (145.4) vs. Hakeem Dawodu (145.8)
